mapper.insert: INSERT INTO realestate.item_buy (item_uid, market_item_uid, price, nft_id, contract_address, `index`) VALUES (#{itemUid}, #{marketItemUid}, #{price}, #{nftId}, #{contractAddress}, #{index})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM realestate.item_buy AS ib LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.item AS i ON ib.item_uid = i.uid AND i.deleted_flag = false AND i.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.`member` m ON i.member_uid = m.uid AND m.deleted_flag = false AND m.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.exchange usd ON usd.code = 'FRX.KRWUSD' AND usd.deleted_flag = false AND usd.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.exchange_virtual usdt on usdt.name = 'USDT_USD' AND usdt.deleted_flag = false AND usdt.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS acc ON i.allocation_uid = acc.uid AND acc.deleted_flag = false AND acc.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS scc ON i.status_uid = scc.uid AND scc.deleted_flag = false AND scc.used_flag = true WHERE ib.deleted_flag = false AND ib.used_flag = true AND i.current_quantity > 0 AND ib.market_item_uid = #{request.marketItemUid}

SELECT ib.uid, ib.created_at, ib.updated_at, ib.deleted_flag, ib.used_flag,
ib.item_uid, ib.market_item_uid, i.quantity, i.current_quantity, ib.price, ib.price / usd.base_price AS usd_price, ib.price / usd.base_price / usdt.`last` AS usdt_price, ib.nft_id, ib.contract_address, i.member_uid , i.allocation_uid , acc.name AS allocation_name, i.status_uid , scc.name AS status_name, i.image_uri , CONCAT(i.project_name, '#', ib.`index`) AS project_name, i.total_price, i.total_price / usd.base_price AS usd_total_price, i.total_price / usd.base_price / usdt.`last` AS usdt_total_price, i.quantity, i.current_quantity, i.allocation_day, i.`right`, i.location, i.core_value, i.area, i.`scale`, i.purpose, i.company_name, i.approval_at, i.website_uri, i.detail, i.token_uri, m.wallet_address FROM realestate.item_buy AS ib LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.item AS i ON ib.item_uid = i.uid AND i.deleted_flag = false AND i.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.`member` m ON i.member_uid = m.uid AND m.deleted_flag = false AND m.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.exchange usd ON usd.code = 'FRX.KRWUSD' AND usd.deleted_flag = false AND usd.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.exchange_virtual usdt on usdt.name = 'USDT_USD' AND usdt.deleted_flag = false AND usdt.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS acc ON i.allocation_uid = acc.uid AND acc.deleted_flag = false AND acc.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS scc ON i.status_uid = scc.uid AND scc.deleted_flag = false AND scc.used_flag = true WHERE ib.deleted_flag = false AND ib.used_flag = true AND i.current_quantity > 0 AND ib.market_item_uid = #{request.marketItemUid} LIMIT #{request.offsetAndRowCount.offset}, #{request.offsetAndRowCount.rowCount}
